Anna käyttäjälle hallinnointioikeudet ky: Give user administrative rights to the survey

Jos haluat, että tietty ryh: NOTE! Groups below the minimum size will be dropped. If you wish for a group to be mandatory, click the checkbox on the left.

Jotta tämä toimisi, tulee r: If you want to limit how many times a respondent can participate in the same group, answer yes here. You can later set the maximum number of participation times for each group in the stage table. For this to work, the group must have the same name in all stages.

Jos haluat, ettei jonkun tietyn sarakkee: If you want to ensure that information from a specific column is not shown to students during the response phase, append an asterisk (*) at the end of the column name.

Pakollisen ryhmän mimimikok: If the minimum size of the group doesn't matter, enter 0. A mandatory group can not be set to 0.

Salliessasi poissaolot, vastaajat voivat: If you allow absences, respondents can mark themselves as absent from the stages they select.

Suositellaan, että vaaditaan kaikkien ry: It is recommended that all groups be organized unless there is a large number of them (>10).

Sarakkeen voit luoda painamalla: Enter the groups that the survey respondent can prioritize   in order of preference. Also, provide the maximum size for each group. If desired, you can add additional information about each item in separate columns. Create a new column by clicking on '+ Add Field'.

Kuvausteksti näytetään vastaajalle kyse: Here you can provide a description of the survey and instructions for responding. The description text will be shown to the respondents alongside the survey.

Tuo valinnat CSV-tiedostosta: Import selections from a CSV file.

Vastausaika määrittää aikavälin, jolloin: Response time defines the period during which it is possible to   respond to the survey.

Voit muokata kyselyn kuvausta: You can edit the survey description.
Voit muokata vain kyselyn nimeä, vastaus: You can only edit the name, time and the description of a survey
